unknown_responses.rationale: The segment reports a past outcome ('recovered'), not speculation about future relief.
The segment reports a past/current fact about symptoms.
The segment reports a general fact about symptoms.
The segment reports a general fact.
The segment speculates about a potential future negative outcome ('may still be held'), not relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event and outcome.
The segment reports a current/past fact (absence of positive tests).
The segment reports opinions and assessments.
The segment reports a past event ('have requested').
The segment reports a fact about what was not said.
